prompt: Create a C4Container diagram 'Microservices Architecture'. Title it 'Order Service Containers'. Include external `System_Ext` (ui, 'Frontend UI') and `System_Ext` (payment_svc, 'Payment Service'). Define a `Container_Boundary` (c1, 'Order Service') containing: `Container` (order_api, 'Order API', 'Java', 'Public API'), `Container` (order_logic, 'Order Logic', '.NET', 'Business rules'), `ContainerDb` (order_db, 'Order DB', 'MySQL', 'Order data'), and `ContainerQueue_Ext` (inventory_q, 'Inventory Update Queue', 'RabbitMQ'). Show `ui` 'Calls' `order_api`. `order_api` 'Delegates to' `order_logic`. `order_logic` 'Accesses' `order_db`. `order_logic` 'Calls' `payment_svc`. `order_logic` 'Sends update to' `inventory_q`.
output:
C4Container
  title Order Service Containers

  System_Ext(ui, "Frontend UI")
  System_Ext(payment_svc, "Payment Service")

  Container_Boundary(c1, "Order Service") {
    Container(order_api, "Order API", "Java", "Public API", "Handles external requests and exposes endpoints for placing orders.")
    Container(order_logic, "Order Logic", ".NET", "Business rules", "Implements business rules and validation for orders.")
    ContainerDb(order_db, "Order DB", "MySQL", "Database", "Stores order details, product information, and payment status.")
    ContainerQueue_Ext(inventory_q, "Inventory Update Queue", "RabbitMQ", "Messaging Queue", "Receives inventory updates from the Order Logic component.")
  }

  Rel(ui, order_api, "Calls")
  Rel(order_api, order_logic, "Delegates to")
  Rel(order_logic, order_db, "Accesses")
  Rel(order_logic, payment_svc, "Calls")
  Rel(order_logic, inventory_q, "Sends update to")

  UpdateRelStyle(ui, order_api, $offsetY="-20")
  UpdateRelStyle(order_api, order_logic, $offsetY="-20")
  UpdateRelStyle(order_logic, order_db, $offsetY="20")
  UpdateRelStyle(order_logic, payment_svc, $offsetY="-20")
  UpdateRelStyle(order_logic, inventory_q, $offsetY="-20", $offsetX="80")

Show `order_service` 'Initiates payment via' `payment_ctrl`. `payment_ctrl` 'Uses' `stripe_gw`. `payment_ctrl` 'Uses' `paypal_gw`. `payment_ctrl` 'Logs transaction to' `txn_log`.
output:
C4Component
  title Payment Processing Components

  Container(order_service, "Order Service", "External system initiating payments")

  Container_Boundary(payment_container, "Payment Service Container") {
    Component(payment_ctrl, "Payment Controller", "Flask", "Handles payment requests, processes API calls")
    Component(stripe_gw, "Stripe Gateway", "Python Lib", "Interacts with Stripe API")
    Component(paypal_gw, "PayPal Gateway", "Python Lib", "Interacts with PayPal API")
    ComponentDb(txn_log, "Transaction Log DB", "DynamoDB", "Logs details of each payment event")

    Rel(payment_ctrl, stripe_gw, "Uses")
    Rel(payment_ctrl, paypal_gw, "Uses")
    Rel(payment_ctrl, txn_log, "Logs transaction to")
  }

  Rel(order_service, payment_ctrl, "Initiates payment via")
  UpdateRelStyle(order_service, payment_ctrl, $offsetY="-20")
  UpdateRelStyle(payment_ctrl, stripe_gw, $offsetY="-20")
  UpdateRelStyle(payment_ctrl, paypal_gw, $offsetX="-50", $offsetY="40")
  UpdateRelStyle(payment_ctrl, txn_log, $offsetX="50", $offsetY="40")

prompt: Create a C4Component diagram for an 'API Application'. Title it 'API Application Components'. Include an external `Container` (spa, 'Single Page App', 'React'). Define a `Container_Boundary` (api, 'API Application') containing: `Component` (auth_ctrl, 'Auth Controller', 'Spring MVC', 'Handles login/signup'), `Component` (user_service, 'User Service', 'Spring Bean', 'Manages user logic'), `Component` (email_comp, 'Email Component', 'Java Lib', 'Sends emails'), and `ComponentDb` (user_db_access, 'User DB Access', 'JPA', 'Data access layer for users'). Include external `System_Ext` (smtp_server, 'SMTP Server'). Show `spa` 'Calls' `auth_ctrl`. `auth_ctrl` 'Uses' `user_service`. `user_service` 'Uses' `user_db_access`. `user_service` 'Uses' `email_comp`. `email_comp` 'Sends via' `smtp_server`.
output:
C4Component
  title API Application Components

  spa = Container(spa, "Single Page App", "React")
  System_Ext(smtp_server, "SMTP Server")

  Container_Boundary(api, "API Application") {
    Component(auth_ctrl, "Auth Controller", "Spring MVC", "Handles login/signup")
    Component(user_service, "User Service", "Spring Bean", "Manages user logic")
    Component(email_comp, "Email Component", "Java Lib", "Sends emails")
    ComponentDb(user_db_access, "User DB Access", "JPA", "Data access layer for users")
  }

  Rel(spa, auth_ctrl, "Calls")
  Rel(auth_ctrl, user_service, "Uses")
  Rel(user_service, user_db_access, "Uses")
  Rel(user_service, email_comp, "Uses")
  Rel(email_comp, smtp_server, "Sends via")

  UpdateLayoutConfig($c4ShapeInRow="3", $c4OrderInRow="1, 2, 3")

prompt: Construct a data processing pipeline: `data_source_api` (internet) [Source API] sends data (`-->` R:L) to `ingestion_service` (server) [Ingest]. `ingestion_service` puts data (`-->` R:L) onto `message_queue` (server) [Queue]. `stream_processor` (server) [Processor] reads from `message_queue` (`-->` T:B). `stream_processor` writes (`-->` R:L) to `processed_db` (database) [Processed DB] and (`-->` B:T) to `data_lake` (disk) [Data Lake]. `dashboard_app` (server) [Dashboard] reads from `processed_db` (`<--` L:R).

architecture-beta
    service data_source_api[Source API]
    service ingestion_service[Ingest]
    service message_queue[Queue]
    service stream_processor[Processor]
    service processed_db[Processed DB]
    service data_lake[Data Lake]
    service dashboard_app[Dashboard]

    data_source_api --> R:L: ingestion_service
    ingestion_service --> R:L: message_queue
    stream_processor --> T:B: message_queue
    stream_processor --> R:L: processed_db
    stream_processor --> B:T: data_lake
